External supervisor for many students, e.g., @Newcastle University and QMUL, UK. Associate Editor for IEEE Transactions on Vehicular Technology, IEEE Wireless Communications Letters, and IEEE Access; serves/served as a Lead/Guest Editor for many international journals and TPC Track Chair/Publicity Co-Chair/Session Chair/TPC member for many conferences. Invited as a reviewer for many international journals, e.g., IEEE Transactions, and for Books from Elsevier, Taylor & Francis, Wiley, Springer, etc. Invited to talk at 20+ universities and organizations, such as IEEE ComSoc School Series UK and Ireland, University of Exeter, University of Tunis, and SAP. All the students/research fellows in my group will have a lot of opportunities to collaborate with our national and international partners in Europe, Canada, and Australia. The students will conduct Secondments (up to 12 Months in their study, fees will be covered) to prestigious universities including KTH, Sweden, University of Göttingen, Germany, TU/e and TU Delft, Netherlands, University of Alberta, Canada, University of Sydney, Australia and many others, via our EU Horizon Europe HarmonicAI and COVER, and Royal Society International exchange projects. If you are interested in pursuing a PhD with me or joining my group, e.g., as an EU MSCA Postdoctoral Fellow or Newton International Fellow, please do not hesitate to email me your CV.
